verses.roman:
kīrtanīyā-gaṇe dila mālya-candana
svarūpa, śrīvāsa,-yāhāṅ mukhya dui-jana

synonyms: kīrtanīyā-gaṇe—unto the performers of saṅkīrtana; dila—gave; mālya-candana—garlands and sandalwood pulp; svarūpa—Svarūpa; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa; yāhāṅ—where; mukhya—principal; dui-jana—two persons.
translation: The Lord also gave garlands and sandalwood pulp to the performers of saṅkīrtana. The chief two performers were Svarūpa Dāmodara and Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura.
